casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jack MOORE. No. 253P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 26, 2006. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of July 2006 by Defendant for Petition of Habeas Corpus in Motion to Resubmit Petition of Motion for Appropriate Relief/Certiorari:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of July 2006."
